scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn deploy-except-html && yarn deploy-html
scripts.deploy-except-html: aws s3 sync ./dist s3://orderhop-landing.ara.live --exclude 'index.html' --region ap-northeast-2 --acl bucket-owner-full-control --delete --cache-control 'max-age=0,s-maxage=31536000,must-revalidate'
